Title: My Fairy Tail Love Story
Writer: Jun Lana (screenplay), Denoy Navarro-Punio (screenplay), J.K. De Leon (screenplay)
Actors: Janella Salvador, Elmo Magalona, Kiko Estrada, Kiray Celis
Plot: Chantel is a spoiled brat cursed to be a mermaid after she disturbed corals under the sea. With the help of her best friend Noah, they go on a journey to find her Prince Charming who she believes will break the curse she's in.
